name: SHERLOCK HOLMES - A Study in Scarlet
name_original: SHERLOCK HOLMES - A Study in Scarlet
description:
"There’s the scarlet thread of murder running through the colourless skein of life, and our duty is to unravel it, and isolate it, and expose every inch of it."

Mr. Waton returned from Afghanistan. And he met Sherlock Homlse, a little bit queer. And they decided to share the rooms at No 221B, Baker Street. Homlse introduced himself as a consulting detective and they got one letter from Gregson about a murder case. In the scene, they found a dead man. Even though the body didn't have any wounds, but there was scrawled in blood-red letters on the wall. "RACHE"...

A Study in Scarlet is the first book of the Sherlock Holmes series by Conan Doyle. You can read the book and solve quizzes and puzzles in this game. This game will increase your power of inference and logical thinking ability.

Find the logical sequences from items. And put the right answer you found to the broken part.

Thank you.
